article.title: Providing Bibliograhic Services From Machine-Radable Data Bases -The Library's Role
article.author: De Gennaro, Richard
article.text: Libraries will play a key role in providing access to data bases, but not by subscribing to tape services and establishing local processing centers as is commonly assumed.. High costs and the nature of the demand will make this approach unfeasible.. It is more likely that the library's reference staff will develop the capability of serving as a broker between the local campus user and the various regional or specialized retail distribution centers which exist or will be established..
